Description: Appears to be a counterfeit copy of a Carvin guitar; checked electronics and they have strange cyrillic writing on them, so maybe a a Russian/Ukranian copy? Either way, the single coil pickups in it are from the 80's Martin strat copies, and they definitely have some serious bite! Sounds alot like Steely Dan leads. This guitar rips! The bridge humbucker pickup is unknown but serves the purpose. It's really all about the single coil sound with this guitar. Has some surface scratches and a few dings in the black paint, and also a decent amount of scrapes on the maple fretboard that appears to be play wear, but the frets are smooth and shiny and have no buzzes or issues. An interesting one-of-a-kind guitar that actually plays well! Feel free to ask any questions. FREE SHIPPING to the lower 48 states! A hardcase is also available for this guitar for an additional $60, or a soft gig bag for $10--let me know before paying and I'll include it. Either way, this guitar will be packaged extremely securely for battle! ------------------------------------------------------- If you use 'Buy It Now'- please place payment immediately in order to secure the item. Insurance: Insurance is your option (unless included and specified otherwise in the auction)-; I am not responsible for any damage to the item(s) incurred during shipping. If you want to insure the item(s) - I will do so for an additional charge based on the final Auction Value. Combined Shipping: If bidding on multiple items, please note that I will discount each additional item as much as possible! Refunds/Returns: I will accept returns for (non As Is) items that are non-functioning on arrival - if the Buyer notifies me via e-mail within 3 days of the problem and ships the Item back within 10 days. If the Item is truly non-functional, I will refund the Auction Final Value (minus any shipping). If the Item is working properly, I will not refund the Auction, the item must be returned to the buyer. Any returned Items must be received in the original packaging, must pay return shipping; serial numbers are recorded and checked. As Is Auctions: Any item(s) sold As Is is not subject to return for any reason. It is advertised/sold As Is;- I attempt to list all items with full descriptions of any functional issues and all known details. Thanks for looking and Happy Bidding!
